property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains flying and first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When you put all of yourself into an attack, without fear or hesitation, in that instant you may attain greatness." - Predak, Gateless freemage

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Boros built a prison in the sky where Azorius statutes couldn't restrict their sense of justice.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying At the beginning of each combat, choose first strike, vigilance, or lifelink. Creatures you control gain that ability until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A keen mind wields an army as a deft hand wields a sword."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Simic offer a prize to any biomancer who can breed a krasis to match a griffin in the air. It's never been claimed." - Libuse, Boros sergeant

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {WB}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {WB}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.) Artifacts and creatures your opponents control enter the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "By the time your knees have worn through your robe, you may have begun to learn your place."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Battalion - Whenever Boros Elite and at least two other creatures attack, Boros Elite gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "First, you must fight among the rank and file. It is there I will discern your skills as a leader." - Aurelia, to Gideon Jura

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever another white creature enters the battlefield under your control, tap target creature an opponent controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Boros fight for justice. The Azorius fight for law. I hold the line between, and make sure the people are given both."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Battalion - Whenever Daring Skyjek and at least two other creatures attack, Daring Skyjek gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The hard part isn't landing in the saddle. The hard part is leaping before you see it."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant land Enchanted land has "{T}: Tap target creature."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You may not be able to pay. But you can still kneel." - Milana, Orzhov prelate

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They are useful, but there's little satisfaction in supplication that throws itself under your heel." - Jozica, Orzhov enforcer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Battalion - Whenever Frontline Medic and at least two other creatures attack, creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn. Sacrifice Frontline Medic: Counter target spell with {X} in its mana cost unless its controller pays {3}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+1]: Put a loyalty counter on Gideon, Champion of Justice for each creature target opponent controls. [0]: Until end of turn, Gideon, Champion of Justice becomes a Human Soldier creature with power and toughness each equal to the number of loyalty counters on him and gains indestructible. He's still a planeswalker. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to him this turn. −15: Exile all other permanents.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Guardian of the Gateless can block any number of creatures. Whenever Guardian of the Gateless blocks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature it's blocking.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has protection from multicolored.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Gateless have risen. The Ten shall fall." - Ninth District graffiti

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control get +0/+1 for each Gate you control and have vigilance.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We grew up on these streets. We know them better than any Boros grunt from Zelzo."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has protection from creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The guilds promise to provide safety. I prefer to make my own." - Briska, Ninth District freemage

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {WB}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He can calculate interest to six decimal places even in the midst of a deadly duel.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create two 2/2 white Knight creature tokens with vigilance.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We lost respect after the battle for Barbu Rooftop. Send the troops to mingle respectfully with the citizens." - Commander Yaszen of Boros

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance When Luminate Primordial enters the battlefield, for each opponent, exile up to one target creature that player controls and that player gains life equal to its power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature you control When enchanted creature dies, create X 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens, where X is its power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Every death has a web of consequences. Our job is to find the spider."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Battalion - Whenever Nav Squad Commandos and at least two other creatures attack, Nav Squad Commandos gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Untap it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Funded by the Azorius to keep current maps of the undercity, the Boros nav squads survey even the most unsavory areas.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control get +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In the name of peace, moderation, and decency - wipe them all out!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Izzet delved into the depths of Ravnica's past, and Selesnya followed without fear.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Sure, today of all days, he asked to borrow my boots!" - Darijo, Ivy Street ruffian

property.name: Rules
property.value: Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {WB}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Entrance is free. Donations are required." - Notice outside Vizkopa Bank

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Urbis Protector enters the battlefield, create a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I hear that Boros is losing its angels to the Gateless Movement. I'm sure this comes as no surprise to you." - Teysa, to Lazav

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The taming and consecration of these creatures is evidence of our faith." - Resimir, Zarichi Temple priest

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return all attacking creatures to their owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You can come back once you've learned some manners - and figured out how to reconstitute your physical forms."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets -5/-0. {2}{U}: Return Agoraphobia to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Everyone in this city is choosing sides. I choose inside."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender Evolve (Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Evolve (Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Diluvian Primordial enters the battlefield, for each opponent, you may cast up to one target instant or sorcery card from that player's graveyard without paying its mana cost. If a spell cast this way would be put into a graveyard, exile it instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw cards equal to the number of cards in your library, then put a card from your hand on top of your library. You have no maximum hand size until your next turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Don't just have an idea - have all of them." - Niv-Mizzet

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{G}: Frilled Oculus gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Understand the Simic? That's about as easy as winning a staring contest with a homunculus." - Dars Gostok, Firefist captain

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "One tiny peg pulled from a single wagon wheel, and an entire district grinds to a halt." - Lazav

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step. Cipher (Then you may exile this spell card encoded on a creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player, its controller may cast a copy of the encoded card without paying its mana cost.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, Incursion Specialist gets +2/+0 until end of turn and can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Work for the Dimir again? That depends. Tell me more about this maze."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Keymaster Rogue can't be blocked. When Keymaster Rogue enters the battlefield, return a creature you control to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This one opens the grate outside Zelzo Base. This one is for Ismeri Library. This one is for an invisible door . . . No, I've said too much."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw a card. Cipher (Then you may exile this spell card encoded on a creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player, its controller may cast a copy of the encoded card without paying its mana cost.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Leyline Phantom deals combat damage, return it to its owner's hand. (Return it only if it survived combat.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Is the maze itself a phantom? Or is one as real as the other? Perhaps I am as mad as the dragon." - Jace Beleren, journal

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {U}: Metropolis Sprite gets +1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Well, if that goblin didn't want his tongue pierced, he shouldn't have stuck it out at me."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Mindeye Drake dies, target player mills five cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They can map both the cityscape and the minds of its architects.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated. That creature's controller creates a 3/3 green Frog Lizard creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We've merged your life essence with that of several creatures at once. You're welcome." - Speaker Trifon

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Realmwright enters the battlefield, choose a basic land type. Lands you control are the chosen type in addition to their other types.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There is not a single inch of Ravnica that hasn't been altered at one point or another to fit someone's whims.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever another blue creature enters the battlefield under your control, target player mills two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I offer you wisdom untainted by false loyalty, learning free of any guild's agenda."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sapphire drakes can communicate over great distances, their calls resonating in the gems fixed in their skulls.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target noncreature spell. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Should your chosen emissary be able to fluctuate triharmonic pentodes, however unlikely, I shall shunt excess negavolt radicals."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolve (Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.) {1}{U}, {T}: Move a +1/+1 counter from Simic Fluxmage onto target creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolve (Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.) {T}, Remove one or more +1/+1 counters from Simic Manipulator: Gain control of target creature with power less than or equal to the number of +1/+1 counters removed this way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant land Enchanted land has "{T}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Both Boros and Azorius scout the games in hopes of recruiting the finest athletes.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}, where X is the greatest power among creatures you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Like water, mana will drain from an inferior vessel." - Jalan Tosk, Simic forcemage

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create a token that's a copy of target artifact or creature. Cipher (Then you may exile this spell card encoded on a creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player, its controller may cast a copy of the encoded card without paying its mana cost.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put target nonland permanent on top of its owner's library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target creature. Return it to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step. Cipher (Then you may exile this spell card encoded on a creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player, its controller may cast a copy of the encoded card without paying its mana cost.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2. Enchanted creature can't be blocked as long as you control a Gate.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A true shortcut isn't a way other people don't know; it's a way other people can't go.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Balustrade Spy enters the battlefield, target player reveals cards from the top of their library until they reveal a land card, then puts those cards into their graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {WB}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A screech in the night is all it takes for Orzhov debtors to clutch at their coin purses.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant land Enchanted land is a Swamp. Whenever enchanted land becomes tapped, its controller loses 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "No one cares about pollution until they can see it." - Gurras, Golgari rot farmer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender Sacrifice another creature: Corpse Blockade gains deathtouch until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There are laws against it, but the dead have no one to complain to and the living are too frightened to investigate.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {WB}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.) Whenever you tap a Swamp for mana, add an additional {B}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets -X/-X, where X is the number of creature cards in its controller's graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's cold in the grave, and the dead crave your warmth. Who are you to deny them?" - Strava, Dimir mage

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player sacrifices a creature, then gains life equal to that creature's toughness.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His twisted mind concluded that if he was what he ate, and he wanted to stay human, . . .

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature you control When enchanted creature dies, target player loses X life and you gain X life, where X is its power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I wish I could rewrite my every deed and kill you with my first breath instead of my last."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {B}: Gateway Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Tap an untapped Gate you control: Gateway Shade gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Tireless and merciless, shades are harnessed as spies by the Dimir.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target nonartifact creature. Its controller mills cards equal to that creature's power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Watch people flock to a murder scene. Then tell me we're not all a little sick in the head." - Juri, proprietor of the Juri Revue

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Upon finding his warehouse infested, Gaven didn't know whether to get an exterminator or an exorcist.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {U}: Horror of the Dim gains hexproof until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Lesser minds can scarcely imagine such a marriage of necromancy and mind magic." - Strava, Dimir mage

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Selesnya denied us tribute. Let's show them the error of their ways." - Milana, Orzhov prelate

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target creature with power X or less.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A casual glance into a dark corner may be your last.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Lord of the Void deals combat damage to a player, exile the top seven cards of that player's library, then put a creature card from among them onto the battlefield under your control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player discards a card. Cipher (Then you may exile this spell card encoded on a creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player, its controller may cast a copy of the encoded card without paying its mana cost.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. Cipher (Then you may exile this spell card encoded on a creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player, its controller may cast a copy of the encoded card without paying its mana cost.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever another nontoken creature dies, you may create a 1/1 black Rat creature token. Rats you control have deathtouch.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "His tenement is filled with the most vile, disgusting vermin. It's infested with rats, too." - Branko One-Ear

property.name: Rules
property.value: Intimidate (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.) When Sepulchral Primordial enters the battlefield, for each opponent, you may put up to one target creature card from that player's graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever another black creature enters the battlefield under your control, target creature gains intimidate until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target opponent loses 3 life. Cipher (Then you may exile this spell card encoded on a creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player, its controller may cast a copy of the encoded card without paying its mana cost.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Slate Street Ruffian becomes blocked, defending player discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Merciless to the point of psychosis. Let's give him a job." - Zelinas, Orzhov recruiter

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Creatures with flying your opponents control get -1/-1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The skies used to be my refuge, a place of peace away from the chaos below. Now, with every flight, death seems to follow me like a shadow." - Writings of Cica, Skyjek scout

property.name: Rules
property.value: Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {WB}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even the darkest corners of Ravnica still lie in the shadow of the Church.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {WB}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.) {T}, Pay 2 life: Remove a counter from target nonland permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The hunger of a vampire and the subtlety of a tax collector.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}, Sacrifice a creature: Target player reveals cards from the top of their library until they reveal a land card, then puts those cards into their graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Scandal and slander are never welcome news. That's why I'm never the messenger."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player loses 1 life, discards a card, then sacrifices a permanent. Cipher (Then you may exile this spell card encoded on a creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player, its controller may cast a copy of the encoded card without paying its mana cost.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Wight of Precinct Six gets +1/+1 for each creature card in your opponents' graveyards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even the lost and undead need a protector.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Each day uncertainty and rumors spread, and each night attendance at the Juri Revue increases.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Battalion - Whenever Bomber Corps and at least two other creatures attack, Bomber Corps deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {X}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice Cinder Elemental: It deals X damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The old gods awoke and sent fingers of fire to see what was left of the old ways under the endless city." - Daiva, Gruul storyteller

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tap an untapped Gate you control: Crackling Perimeter deals 1 damage to each opponent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As the path he sought came into focus, Niv-Mizzet took steps to prevent others from approaching it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ember Beast can't attack or block alone.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The only livestock that will survive for long in the Smelting District, ember beasts serve many functions - none of them willingly.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Battalion - Whenever Firefist Striker and at least two other creatures attack, target creature can't block this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The flaming fist of Boros holds the promise of both protection and destruction in its grasp.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage, put a blaze counter on Five-Alarm Fire. Remove five blaze counters from Five-Alarm Fire: It deals 5 damage to any target.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever another red creature enters the battlefield under your control, Foundry Street Denizen gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After the Foundry Street riot, Arrester Hulbein tried to ban bludgeons. Which, inevitably, resulted in another riot.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target blocking creature gets +3/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "At least the Gateless rebels have ideals. Rakdos just mocks, defiles, and kills all we hold dear." - Libuse, Boros sergeant

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, trample Whenever Hellkite Tyrant deals combat damage to a player, gain control of all artifacts that player controls. At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control twenty or more artifacts, you win the game.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control have haste and attack each combat if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Don't let him lead the soldiers, but by all means let him lead the way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Homing Lightning deals 4 damage to target creature and each other creature with the same name as that creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I see countless worlds. What makes them think I can't find them in just one?" - Ral Zarek

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste Battalion - Whenever Legion Loyalist and at least two other creatures attack, creatures you control gain first strike and trample until end of turn and can't be blocked by creature tokens this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/+0 and has menace.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The larger the crowd, the harder it is for them to run away.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature an opponent controls blocks this turn if able. Untap that creature. Other creatures that player controls can't block this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Everyone roots for the little guy, but nobody bets on him.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Massive Raid deals damage to any target equal to the number of creatures you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Boros lack vision. Give them a convenient scapegoat and they'll be blind to the true threats." - Lazav

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste When Molten Primordial enters the battlefield, for each opponent, gain control of up to one target creature that player controls until end of turn. Untap those creatures. They gain haste until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mugging deals 2 damage to target creature. That creature can't block this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Scream: muffled. Pockets: emptied. Neck function: never the same again.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As Ravnica's wilds expanded, even advocates for nature had to confront fiercer natural threats.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bloodrush - {1}{R}{R}, Discard Scorchwalker: Target attacking creature gets +5/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Borborygmos's elemental launched an assault, but the Izzet wards held and experiments continue." - Skyknight report on the Rubblebelt

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bloodrush - {R}, Discard Skinbrand Goblin: Target attacking creature gets +2/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "These Gruul skin-runes - discern whether their patterns evoke streets, leylines, or both. You have four days." - Niv-Mizzet, to his assistant

property.name: Rules
property.value: Players can't gain life this turn. Damage can't be prevented this turn. Skullcrack deals 3 damage to target player or planeswalker.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The lawmage's argument was clever and well reasoned, but Blunk's response proved irrefutable.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player sacrifices an artifact and a land. Structural Collapse deals 2 damage to that player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Gruul holiday of Rauck-Chauv always ends the same way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant land Enchanted land has "{T}, Discard a card: Draw a card."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Sometimes I stroll along Tin Street and watch citizens busy with their daily lives. It reminds me why I do my job." - Arrester Lavinia, Tenth Precinct

property.name: Rules
property.value: {W}: Towering Thunderfist gains vigilance until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Nothing ruins a party like one of those big killjoys bursting through the door and setting all the guests free." - Ruba, Rakdos cultist

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike Bloodrush - {2}{R}, Discard Viashino Shanktail: Target attacking creature gets +3/+1 and gains first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Slizt Clan's battle cry is an impressive display of fury, defiance, and spit.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Battalion - Whenever Warmind Infantry and at least two other creatures attack, Warmind Infantry gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Before Aurelia denounced Niv-Mizzet, the two guilds had collaborated on the Warmind Initiative in pursuit of the ultimate soldier.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Double strike Bloodrush - {3}{R}{R}, Discard Wrecking Ogre: Target attacking creature gets +3/+3 and gains double strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If no opponent can be found, ogres of the Bolrac Clan will often pick fights with buildings.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolve (Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Eh, needs more toad." - Gulistan, Simic biomancer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has hexproof and can't be blocked by more than one creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even the bitterest enemies of the Burning-Tree Clan respect the strength of Borborygmos's rule.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature and untap it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Our fight is not about territory or revenge. It is about freedom, plain and simple." - Ruric Thar, Ghor-Clan chieftain

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) Evolve (Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has trample.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The best way to calm a rampaging ceratok is to wait until it dies of natural causes.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {R}: Disciple of the Old Ways gains first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Selesnya thinks nature is a pretty plaything. True nature would rip their faces off and wear their skins as trophies."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolve (Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.) Remove two +1/+1 counters from Experiment One: Regenerate Experiment One. (The next time this creature would be destroyed, instead tap it, remove it from combat, and heal all damage on it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on enchanted creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We're planting the seeds of change. Sometimes, we plant them in people." - Vorel of the Hull Clade

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Whenever Giant Adephage deals combat damage to a player, create a token that's a copy of Giant Adephage.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "To a creature like that, we must seem like, well, bugs." - Dars Gostok, Firefist captain

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Izzet may incite war, but my duty is here. I will not abandon the wild."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolve (Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.) {T}: Add {G} for each +1/+1 counter on Gyre Sage.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn by creatures with no +1/+1 counters on them.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Woodlands and laws. Both grow faster than the Azorius's ability to manage them." - Suniel the Woodwise

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever another green creature enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Skyknight gear? Well, I have drake-skin gauntlets, supple and fireproof. Or a ceratok chestplate that'll stop a crossbow bolt."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create an X/X green Ooze creature token, where X is the greatest power among creatures you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We paid the Simic very well for this capability, but we should quickly recoup our expenses in saved wages." - Milana, Orzhov prelate

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "And if you threaten me again, your shiny steel trousers will be sprouting daggerthorn vines." - Iveta, rooftop runner

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{G}, Remove one or more +1/+1 counters from among creatures you control: Create an X/X green Ooze creature token, where X is the number of +1/+1 counters removed this way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose target creature you control. You gain life equal to that creature's power plus its toughness.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Other guilds say the Gruul are savages, no better than the beasts we live with. I say we've found friends who won't stab us in the back." - Domri Rade

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Rust Scarab becomes blocked, you may destroy target artifact or enchantment defending player controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Behold nature's answer to the problem of society." - Nikya of the Old Ways

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bloodrush - {1}{G}, Discard Scab-Clan Charger: Target attacking creature gets +2/+4 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The only roads I wish to see are those beaten flat by wild hooves."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shuffle Serene Remembrance and up to three target cards from a single graveyard into their owners' libraries.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: While Lazav schemed and Niv-Mizzet researched, Trostani sought the future in the whispers of the past.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Bloodrush - {5}{G}{G}, Discard Skarrg Goliath: Target attacking creature gets +9/+9 and gains trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They bind us with their laws. We free ourselves with nature's fist." - Nikya of the Old Ways

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bloodrush - {G}, Discard Slaughterhorn: Target attacking creature gets +3/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Orzhov clergy would never cross its path, but sending thrull couriers to do so is cheap and entertaining.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Spire Tracer can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Cartographers on Ravnica chart not just the horizontal, but also the vertical.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reach When Sylvan Primordial enters the battlefield, for each opponent, destroy target noncreature permanent that player controls. For each permanent destroyed this way, search your library for a Forest card and put that card onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control get +0/+5 and gain reach until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The drakes are practice. We may one day need to bring down a sky swallower, or maybe even Rakdos himself." - Korun Nar, Rubblebelt hunter

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant land When Verdant Haven enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life. Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds an additional one mana of any color.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Deathtouch Bloodrush - {G}, Discard Wasteland Viper: Target attacking creature gets +1/+2 and gains deathtouch until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Gruul embrace all things poisonous and living in the cracks of society." - Teysa Karlov, Grand Envoy of Orzhov

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In Ravnica, there are maladies far more difficult to treat than death.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures blocking or blocked by Alms Beast have lifelink.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Alms-coins are only redeemable at Orzhov businesses.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a muster counter on Assemble the Legion. Then create a 1/1 red and white Soldier creature token with haste for each muster counter on Assemble the Legion.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, vigilance, haste Whenever Aurelia, the Warleader attacks for the first time each turn, untap all creatures you control. After this phase, there is an additional combat phase.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Where Razia was aloof and untouchable, Aurelia is on the frontlines, calling for war.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Aurelia's Fury deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of targets. Tap each creature dealt damage this way. Players dealt damage this way can't cast noncreature spells this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Draw a card, then exile a card from your hand face down. You may look at cards exiled with Bane Alley Broker. {U}{B}, {T}: Return a card exiled with Bane Alley Broker to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of the end step, if you control four or more creatures named Biovisionary, you win the game.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He tired of his fellow researchers and their useless prattling, so he decided to make a network of scholars with whom he could carry a conversation.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Whenever Borborygmos Enraged deals combat damage to a player, reveal the top three cards of your library. Put all land cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest into your graveyard. Discard a land card: Borborygmos Enraged deals 3 damage to any target.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Boros Charm deals 4 damage to target player or planeswalker. • Permanents you control gain indestructible until end of turn. • Target creature gains double strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Practice compassion and mercy. But know when they must end." - Aurelia

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create a 1/1 blue and black Horror creature token with flying. Cipher (Then you may exile this spell card encoded on a creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player, its controller may cast a copy of the encoded card without paying its mana cost.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice another creature: Cartel Aristocrat gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Your life serves a higher purpose now: ensuring the continuation of my own."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one or more - • Clan Defiance deals X damage to target creature with flying. • Clan Defiance deals X damage to target creature without flying. • Clan Defiance deals X damage to target player or planeswalker.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Consuming Aberration's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in your opponents' graveyards. Whenever you cast a spell, each opponent reveals cards from the top of their library until they reveal a land card, then puts those cards into their graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Deathpact Angel dies, create a 1/1 white and black Cleric creature token. It has "{3}{W}{B}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice this creature: Return a card named Deathpact Angel from your graveyard to the battlefield."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Counter target sorcery spell. • Destroy target creature with power 2 or less. • Look at the top three cards of target player's library. Put one back and the rest into that player's graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Dangerous to recognize. Deadly not to." - Lazav

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Dinrova Horror enters the battlefield, return target permanent to its owner's hand, then that player discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Welcome to the Dimir Public Offices. Not responsible for death or loss of property. Basement off-limits." - Sign outside Dinrova Building

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+1]: Look at the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, you may reveal it and put it into your hand. −2: Target creature you control fights another target creature. −7: You get an emblem with "Creatures you control have double strike, trample, hexproof, and haste."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Cautious not to repeat Vig's mistakes, the Simic fuse life essences using magic alone. Each result is called a krasis.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{U}{B}: Whenever a card is put into an opponent's graveyard from anywhere this turn, that player loses 1 life. {2}{U}{B}: Target player mills two cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, each player reveals the top card of their library, loses life equal to that card's mana value, then puts it into their hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Elusive Krasis can't be blocked. Evolve (Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature that dealt damage this turn gets -5/-5 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The contract specified an appendage for a missed payment. Read the fine print: the head is an appendage."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolve (Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.) Whenever a +1/+1 counter is put on Fathom Mage, you may draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Battalion - Whenever Firemane Avenger and at least two other creatures attack, Firemane Avenger deals 3 damage to any target and you gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Firemane Nevena led the victorious assault on the Barbu Rooftop rebels. Now the Gateless have marked her for death.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Fortress Cyclops attacks, it gets +3/+0 until end of turn. Whenever Fortress Cyclops blocks, it gets +0/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They think they tamed him, but he will always be a wild titan, a force of nature." - Nedja, Gruul shaman

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Foundry Champion enters the battlefield, it deals damage to any target equal to the number of creatures you control. {R}: Foundry Champion gets +1/+0 until end of turn. {W}: Foundry Champion gets +0/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target land. Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Izzet contraptions pollute our lands. Burn them down, kill the makers, cleanse the earth." - Nedja, Gruul shaman

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Bloodrush - {R}{G}, Discard Ghor-Clan Rampager: Target attacking creature gets +4/+4 and gains trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Simic come from the cold slow depths. How could they understand the fire in a wild heart?" - Kroshkar, Gruul shaman

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ground Assault deals damage to target creature equal to the number of lands you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Taking down a dragon is easy. All you need is enough space to get in a good swing." - Narbulg Nine Fingers

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Creatures without flying can't block this turn. • Gain control of all permanents you own. • Gruul Charm deals 3 damage to each creature with flying.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Gruul Ragebeast or another creature enters the battlefield under your control, that creature fights target creature an opponent controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If the other guilds want a war, they should know we've been ready the whole time." - Ruric Thar, Ghor-Clan chieftain

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever High Priest of Penance is dealt damage, you may destroy target nonland permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "All I require is faith, loyalty, obedience, trust, and complete and utter devotion."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target land becomes a 3/3 Elemental creature with flying until end of turn. It's still a land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "While the sea may be our home, the sky is our destiny." - Prime Speaker Zegana

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {WB}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Debt and death sound so similar, and thrulls are so hard of hearing. Mistakes are inevitable." - Milana, Orzhov prelate

property.name: Rules
property.value: Hexproof Whenever a creature card is put into an opponent's graveyard from anywhere, you may have Lazav, Dimir Mastermind become a copy of that card, except its name is Lazav, Dimir Mastermind, it's legendary in addition to its other types, and it has hexproof and this ability.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +3/+0 until end of turn. Target creature gets +0/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Yes, Boros tactics are unparalleled. But when your comrades are dying around you, inner strength must carry the day." - Gideon Jura, to Aurelia

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each other creature you control enters the battlefield with a number of additional +1/+1 counters on it equal to Master Biomancer's power and as a Mutant in addition to its other types.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Nature is a wonderful engineer but works far too slowly for my tastes."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Exile all artifacts. • Exile all creatures. • Exile all enchantments. • Exile all planeswalkers.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I once saw the Obzedat moved to action. Since that day, I've been thankful that they're mainly lazy, and dead." - Aurelia, to Gideon Jura

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each opponent reveals cards from the top of their library until they reveal X land cards, then puts all cards revealed this way into their graveyard. X can't be 0.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Mortus Strider dies, return it to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Dimir's best agents hide from death itself.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell. Create an X/X green Ooze creature token, where X is that spell's mana value.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Simic can grow anything out of a puddle of sludge. I just hope they never join forces with the Golgari." - Teysa Karlov, Grand Envoy of Orzhov

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Nimbus Swimmer enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Simic soon discovered that the sky offered as few constraints on size as the sea.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Obzedat, Ghost Council enters the battlefield, target opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life. At the beginning of your end step, you may exile Obzedat. If you do, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of your next upkeep. It gains haste.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated. At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, that player loses 1 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Battalion - Whenever Ordruun Veteran and at least two other creatures attack, Ordruun Veteran gains double strike until end of turn. (It deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My father was Gruul, but I chose the precision of the legion over the fury of the pack."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Return target creature you control and all Auras you control attached to it to their owner's hand. • Destroy target creature and you lose life equal to its toughness. • Return target creature card with mana value 1 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player mills three cards. Cipher (Then you may exile this spell card encoded on a creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player, its controller may cast a copy of the encoded card without paying its mana cost.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 and has haste.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Gruul shamans believe all sentient beings have the soul of savagery inside them, an animal form clawing to escape.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prime Speaker Zegana enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the greatest power among other creatures you control. When Prime Speaker Zegana enters the battlefield, draw cards equal to its power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell. Its controller mills two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Until more information could be gleaned about Niv-Mizzet's intentions, Lazav took every opportunity to stall his experiments.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target opponent discards two cards and you gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Orzhov hear the plans of the other guilds through the guilty thoughts of the disloyal.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Rubblehulk's power and toughness are each equal to the number of lands you control. Bloodrush - {1}{R}{G}, Discard Rubblehulk: Target attacking creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of lands you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the architects of Ravnica claim a structure will stand against a wurm, they never mention for how long.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) Evolve (Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for three creature cards and reveal them. If you reveal three cards with different names, choose one of them at random and put that card into your hand. Shuffle the rest into your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Gruul clanfolk obey few rules, but all feel bound to answer the call of the horn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn. • Permanents you control gain hexproof until end of turn. • Return target creature to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We measure our progress in heartbeats." - Prime Speaker Zegana

property.name: Rules
property.value: {R}{G}: Creatures you control gain trample until end of turn. {1}{R}{G}: Target land you control becomes a 4/4 Elemental creature until end of turn. It's still a land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Millennium Platform, once a monument to peace, was quickly seized by the skyknights for its strategic aerial location.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature You control enchanted creature. Discard two cards: Soul Ransom's controller sacrifices it, then draws two cards. Only your opponents may activate this ability.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample, lifelink, haste At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Spark Trooper.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Izzet-designed conductors atop Sunhome charge empty sets of armor that give form to the fluctuating elementals.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{R}{W}: Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn. {2}{R}{W}: Create a 1/1 red and white Soldier creature token with haste.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {WB}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.) Whenever Treasury Thrull attacks, you may return target artifact, creature, or enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance {R}{W}: Truefire Paladin gets +2/+0 until end of turn. {R}{W}: Truefire Paladin gains first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shuffle your library, then reveal the top card. If it's a nonland card, you may cast it without paying its mana cost. If it's a land card, you may put it onto the battlefield and return Unexpected Results to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw three cards. You may play an additional land this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As the Simic released more of their krasis experiments, they required new habitats, always at the expense of the locals.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {WB}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.) When Vizkopa Confessor enters the battlefield, pay any amount of life. Target opponent reveals that many cards from their hand. You choose one of them and exile it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{W}{B}: Target creature gains lifelink until end of turn. {1}{W}{B}: Whenever you gain life this turn, each opponent loses that much life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player discards their hand, then draws cards equal to the greatest number of cards a player discarded this way. Cipher (Then you may exile this spell card encoded on a creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player, its controller may cast a copy of the encoded card without paying its mana cost.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Battalion - Whenever Wojek Halberdiers and at least two other creatures attack, Wojek Halberdiers gains first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Tired of Boros interference, the Rakdos unleashed hellraiser goblins, hoping their corpses would weigh down the halberds.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {G}{U}: This turn, each creature you control enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it. {G}{U}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from a creature you control: Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bloodrush - {1}{R}{G}, Discard Zhur-Taa Swine: Target attacking creature gets +5/+4 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Gurley was the first to domesticate one, though his widow didn't take much solace in that accomplishment.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Arrows of Justice deals 4 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Archers from the Horizon Military Academy hone their skills by targeting pickpockets blocks away.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target card from a graveyard. Create a 1/1 white and black Spirit creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The foyer is littered with the coins it demands but can no longer hold.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control have base power and toughness X/X until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A regression to ancient forms? A glimpse of future evolutions? Or a fleeting alteration of the present?" - Vorel of the Hull Clade

property.name: Rules
property.value: Move any number of +1/+1 counters from target creature onto another target creature with the same controller.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's all right if you change your mind. There's always a chance we can rearrange parts later." - Zija, Simic mutationist

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Boros Reckoner is dealt damage, it deals that much damage to any target. {RW}: Boros Reckoner gains first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Imagine a thunderstorm that's also a tactical genius. That's him." - Dars Gostok, Firefist captain

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Burning-Tree Emissary enters the battlefield, add {R}{G}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Those who regard the Gruul as savage simpletons underestimate the subtle power of their shamans.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player mills four cards. You draw a card for each creature card put into their graveyard this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Ask the right questions in the right way and truth is inevitable." - Lazav

property.name: Rules
property.value: Deathcult Rogue can't be blocked except by Rogues.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The hussars can't catch him, and he evades our traps with ease. I fear he walks unseen even in the halls of New Prahv." - Arrester Lavinia, Tenth Precinct

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has flying and lifelink.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Remember by whose gift you ascend." - Milana, Orzhov prelate

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return each creature card with mana value X from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The fine print of countless contracts has ensured we are never defenseless." - Teysa Karlov, Grand Envoy of Orzhov

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When giant sinkholes opened across Ravnica, they revealed buried oceans and the merfolk, once thought to be extinct.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Nightveil Specter deals combat damage to a player, that player exiles the top card of their library. You may play lands and cast spells from among cards exiled with Nightveil Specter.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature you control fights another target creature. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "All the coins in Ravnica can't save his soul now." - Narbulg Nine Fingers

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Rubblebelt Raiders attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it for each attacking creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This city will perish, and the Gruul will cheer as the boar-god crushes the last bricks into dust." - Nikya of the Old Ways

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Aurelia seems too eager to solve her problems by delivering them to oblivion." - Prime Speaker Zegana

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to Armored Transport by creatures blocking it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If only our jails were as secure." - Arrester Lavinia, Tenth Precinct

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {R} or {W}. {R}{W}: Boros Keyrune becomes a 1/1 red and white Soldier artifact creature with double strike until end of turn. (It deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {U} or {B}. {U}{B}: Dimir Keyrune becomes a 2/2 blue and black Horror artifact creature until end of turn and can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A key that slips through every lock.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures your opponents control with hexproof can be the targets of spells and abilities you control as though they didn't have hexproof. {3}, Sacrifice Glaring Spotlight: Creatures you control gain hexproof until end of turn and can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {R} or {G}. {R}{G}: Gruul Keyrune becomes a 3/2 red and green Beast artifact creature with trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As perilous and unpredictable as the wilds themselves.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever an ability of equipped creature is activated, if it isn't a mana ability, copy that ability. You may choose new targets for the copy. Equip {3}

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's easy to believe you're a god when you're twice as powerful as everyone else.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You've got to keep your wits about you on the roofs. Not all stones are compliant handholds." - Iveta, rooftop runner

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {W} or {B}. {W}{B}: Orzhov Keyrune becomes a 1/4 white and black Thrull artifact creature with lifelink until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: You only need to wield it once to appreciate the power of control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Prophetic Prism enters the battlefield, draw a card. {1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To understand Ravnica, one must first understand how each guild contributes to its stability.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}, {T}: Razortip Whip deals 1 damage to target opponent or planeswalker.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It no longer surprises me what shows up in our raid of a Rakdos revue." - Janik Bara, Wojek captain

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature gets +1/+2. Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Any meeting between guilds requires proper equipment.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {G} or {U}. {G}{U}: Simic Keyrune becomes a 2/3 green and blue Crab artifact creature with hexproof until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature gets +1/+0 and can't be blocked by creatures with flying. Equip {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If bats are the only thing between me and a mountain of Orzhov coins, then I'm about to be a very rich thief."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Boros Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R} or {W}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Enter with merciful hearts. Exit with battle cries.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ({T}: Add {G} or {U}.) As Breeding Pool enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Uncharted depths. Unbounded hopes. Unfathomable mysteries.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Dimir Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U} or {B}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Enter and become a mastermind of spies, lies, and deception.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ({T}: Add {W} or {B}.) As Godless Shrine enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gruul Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R} or {G}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Enter and leave the shackles of society behind.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Orzhov Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W} or {B}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Enter to find wealth, security, and eternal life . . . for just a small price up front.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ({T}: Add {R} or {W}.) As Sacred Foundry enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Burning fervor and fearsome skill create a lethal beauty terrible to behold.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Simic Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G} or {U}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Enter and comprehend the perfection of orchestrated life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ({T}: Add {R} or {G}.) As Stomping Ground enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Roots, ruins, and room to fight. All the comforts of home." - Domri Rade

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {2}, {T}: Thespian's Stage becomes a copy of target land, except it has this ability.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Amid rumors of war, the third act of The Absolution of the Guildpact was quickly rewritten as a tragedy.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ({T}: Add {U} or {B}.) As Watery Grave enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I fear that as we scurry after phantoms, the Dimir pull nine puppet strings." - Ral Zarek
